com.atakmap.android.lrf.reader

Class LRFReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
      • com.atakmap.android.lrf.reader.LRFReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BluetoothConnection.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TruePulseReader

    public class LRFReader
extends BluetoothReader
    Manages the connection and reading from specific supported laser range finders. Attempts to handle both PC and ICD-153. See the serial monitor for the ICD-153 LRF spec. For PLRF-15C Click the azimuth key six times in rapid succession. Hit the range key to cycle between PC/PLGR Click the azimuth key six times in rapid succession to save the value.
